name: 3D Attack Zombie Car
description:
3D Attack Zombie Car is all about exploring the dangerous world packed with veracious killer zombies. Have the driving seat in multiple 4x4 and 6x6 cars, jeeps and monster trucks, drive towards the vast beautiful hilly area and save the resident from attacker zombies. Avoid other cars and obstacles and get as far as you can.
FEATURES
- Explore multiple environments, filled with zombies and fun!
- Multiple vehicles to unlock and drive, each with unique abilities. 4x4, 6x6 vehicles, police car, fire truck, monster truck to crush zombies.
- Machine-gun, shotgun, rocket launcher, electric gun to unlock and use against the dead
- Fight Various Types of Zombie
